name: Critter Thieves
description: A family of hungry mice arrives at a mansion in England, winter is approaching and it is Marcel, our protagonist, who will have to venture inside the house full of traps in order to find food to feed his family. The problem is that Marcel cannot carry all the food he finds and each food he takes will make him slower and heavier to avoid the traps so you will have to plan different strategies to take the food without dying.
